desc: Get your independence back with SPN Mobility Equipment. We provide the most affordable & cost effective stairlifts, commodes & shower chairs, vertical platform lifts, elevation modular ramps, and portable ceiling lifts.

layout.text: Our commode shower chairs are a perfect addition to your bathroom to ensure safety and convenience. We offer these shower chairs for elderly to take a shower and use the toilet quickly and safely. Scroll in our gallery to select the right shower chair for handicapped. Contact us now to enjoy client-friendly installation services.
